com.herokuapp.newsfeedapp.exception

Class GenericWebApplicationExceptionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.herokuapp.newsfeedapp.exception.GenericWebApplicationExceptionHandler

  • @ControllerAdvice
public class GenericWebApplicationExceptionHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles all the exception that are thrown and not handled by the Controllers.
    Since:
    2020-04-30
    Author:
    Sujan Kumar Mitra

public java.lang.String parametersNotPassed(org.springframework.web.bind.MissingServletRequestParameterException exception,

        model - model for putting data model (populated by Spring Container)
